subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Patriots found the answer to Minnesota’s tough run defense: throw the ball.  Tom Brady threw for 372 yards and four touchdowns to help his team to a commanding 31-7 victory over the Vikings.
snippet: The Patriots found the answer to Minnesota’s tough run defense: throw the ball.  Tom Brady threw for 372 yards and four touchdowns to help his team to a commanding 31-7 victory over the Vikings.
